short_summary: Rental of Equipment, Machinery and Tools
description: Canadian Heritage's Capital Experience Branch, as part of its mandate, produces major events which include Canada Day, Winterlude, Winter Lights Across Canada and other events annually. To support these productions and all its operations, PCH requires different types of equipment, machinery, and tools from time to time on an as-and-when required basis.
full_summary:
== Government Tender Announcement ==

### Title and Description

* **Title**: Rental of Equipment, Machinery and Tools
* **Description**: Canadian Heritage is seeking the services of Offerors to provide rental of equipment, machinery and tools for events and operations. Two Standing Offers may be awarded for a period of up to two years, with the possibility of two one-year extensions.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-7729-51477539
* **Solicitation Number**: 10222547A
* **Publication Date**: July 31, 2023
* **Closing Date**: September 8, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Trade Agreements**: Eligible under the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Canadian Heritage
* **Address**: 15 Eddy Street, Gatineau, QC K1A 0M5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Nicole Sabourin
* **Email**: contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 819-271-7204

### Tender Documents

* **English:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7729/10222547a-rfso-en.pdf
* **French:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7729/10222547a-doc-fr.pdf
* **Excel Attachment:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7729/10222547a-attachment-2-to-part-4-example-of-requirements-for-financial-evaluation.xlsx

### Notice Type and Procurement Method

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria

* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* **Region of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
